long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click to Dial Phone Number Google Chrome Extension.

The Click to Dial Phone Number Chrome extension offers a convenient solution for effortlessly dialing phone numbers found on web pages which aren't formatted as a hyperlinks and thus are not clickable. No longer do you need to manually copy and paste phone numbers into your dialing program. With this extension, simply highlight a phone number on any web page, right-click, and select "Dial Phone Number" from the context menu to instantly initiate a call using your preferred dialing program.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration: Easily dial phone numbers found on any web page with a simple right-click.
Quick and Easy: Eliminate the hassle of manually entering phone numbers by leveraging the extension's intuitive interface.
Efficient Workflow: Streamline your workflow by saving time and effort when making calls from web pages.

Enhance your browsing experience and productivity with the Click to Dial Phone Number Chrome extension. Say goodbye to tedious manual dialing and hello to effortless calling right from your browser.
